feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:59 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 09:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: WNW 38 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 07:57 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
